title: (University Members) (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 40 of 2024), hereby order
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

In exercise of the powers conferred on the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage by section 2(1) of the Seanad Electoral (University 
Members) (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 40 of 2024), this Order appoints 21 
March 2025 as the day on which Section 28 of Part 3 and Part 4 of that Act come 
into operation. 

 
 
 
 
 4 [87]
